stories.title: Dodo Pizza
stories.text: The company’s main product is a franchise, the core of which is its proprietary information system, Dodo IS, hosted in the Microsoft Azure cloud.

stories.title: Iceberg
stories.text: The Russian iceberg.hockey analytics system, implemented on the Microsoft Azure platform, makes managing hockey clubs more efficient.

stories.title: Websoft
stories.text: How can you relieve the burden of HR? Which processes simply require automation? Why spend time on tasks which can be solved on their own using WebTutor?

stories.title: Remoto
stories.text: Drivers have found a great solution for remote starting their cars, and are also able to find their vehicles at the supermarket.

stories.title: «Element»
stories.text: Maintenance monitoring, remote control, smart insurance, anti-theft protection and much more is available to drivers.

scenaries.title: Business Analytics
scenaries.text: Microsoft modern business analytics services for creating IT solutions to collect, process, analyse and visualise data.

scenaries.title: Artifical Intelligence
scenaries.text: Use artificial intelligence algorithms to recognise and analyse images, videos and speech in your applications on different platforms (Windows, iOS, Android)

scenaries.title: Big Data
scenaries.text: Scalable services for storing and analysing large volumes of data using machine learning and the Hadoop, Spark and Data Lake Analytics tools

scenaries.title: Internet of Things
scenaries.text: Practical tools for connecting smart devices and securely transmitting and processing data.

scenaries.title: High Performance Computing
scenaries.text: Unlimited resources for scaling tasks related to high performance computing, such as big data analysis, simulation, financial modelling and many more.

scenaries.title: Microservice architecture
scenaries.text: Tools for solutions using microservice architecture. Create scalable and manageable applications using Azure Service Fabric and Azure Container Services open source orchestrators.

scenaries.title: Development and Testing
scenaries.text: Cross-platform tools for application development, testing, implementation and maintenance.

accordion.heading: What are the benefits of the program?
accordion.content:
• Technical support from certified architects and engineers;

  • Resources to promote your solutions through appropriate marketing channels;

  • Selling force to your app or service

accordion.heading: Who can participate in the program?
accordion.content: We are looking for independent software vendors who are building their apps and services on Microsoft cloud technologies or who wants to migrate their apps and services from compete platforms to Microsoft cloud technologies. In order to participate in the program, you need to have a desire to accelerate your business and get more profit and customers in the new digital transformation reality.

accordion.heading: How can I apply to the program?
accordion.content:
To participate in the program there are a few simple steps you’ll need to go through:


  1. Complete the request form below;
  2. We will get back to you in 2 weeks max giving our first feedback on your solution;
  3. If you are qualified, we will ask you to provide additional information about your company and solution (we’ll send some questions via email or call you);
  4. As a final step, you will Iintroduce Microsoft to your solution in person.

accordion.heading: Do I need to sign any agreement?
accordion.content: We will ask you to become a part of our Microsoft Partner Network (MPN), which helps us to keep all our partners up-to-date with all relevant information about discounts, events and other materials. But the most important is your willingness to use Microsoft cloud technologies in your solution.

accordion.heading: We don’t have an independent app or service now but we’d like to cooperate with Microsoft in the field of cloud technologies. What should we do?
accordion.content: Fill in the request form. We’ll try to offer you some interesting partnership options.

accordion.heading: Where can I find out what services are available on the Microsoft Azure cloud platform?
accordion.content:
• You can see all ofall the available options on the Microsoft Azure interactive chart;

  • Technical documentation can be found here;

accordion.heading: Can I try Microsoft Azure for free?
accordion.content: Yes. Create your Azure free account today and get RUB 12,500 worth of $200 Azure credit.Try it.

accordion.heading: I’m a start-up. Are there any special terms for me?
accordion.content: Yes, you can get free access to the latest technologies and also expert support. Apply to the program here.

table.title: Корпоративное соглашение Enterprise Agreement
table.fixation: Да, руб. на три года

table.title: Соглашение Open License
table.features: Покупка ключей у поставщика, предоставляющего вам лицензии на другие ИТ-продукты

table.title: CSP (соглашение с сервисным центром)
table.features: Сервис-провайдеры оказывают консультации по архитектуре решений, помощь с миграцией и разработкой, а также продвижением решений
